author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wang On Properties Says Guidepost Investments Entered Agreement With Wop And East Run
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Wang On Properties Ltd:
* GUIDEPOST INVESTMENTS ENTERED AGREEMENT WITH WOP AND EAST RUN FOR SALE OF ENTIRE STAKE IN TARGET COS FOR HK$350 MILLION
* NET PROCEEDS TO WOP FROM TRANSACTION IS ESTIMATED TO BE ABOUT HK$192.1 MILLION
* ‍EXPECTS TO RECORD A LOSS ON DISPOSAL OF ABOUT HK$73.7 MILLION​
* ‍CONSIDERATION OF HK$350 MILLION TO BE PAID IN CASH​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
